content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

I can see there are two distinct structures in the main target image:

## Structure 1 (Left Side):
- Total blocks: 5
- Layers: 2
- Components:
  - Bottom layer: A blue cube block, with a yellow horizontal rectangular block on top of it, a green cube on the right, and a red cube in front
  - Top layer: An orange triangular prism (roof-shaped) placed on top of the yellow block

## Structure 2 (Right Side):
- Total blocks: 7
- Layers: 2
- Components:
  - Two vertical orange cylindrical blocks in the center
  - An orange triangular prism on top of the cylinders
  - Two blue rectangular blocks on either side of the cylinders
  - Two additional orange triangular prisms - one on the left and one on the right

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

For Structure 1 (Left):
- Block 4: Blue cube (bottom layer)
- Block 7: Yellow horizontal rectangular block (top of blue cube)
- Block 5: Green cube (right side)
- Red cube (not visible in dictionary with exact match)
- Block 15: Orange triangular prism (top roof)

For Structure 2 (Right):
- Block 10: Orange vertical cylinder (two of these)
- Block 6: Blue rectangular blocks (two of these)
- Block 15: Orange triangular prism (on top of cylinders)
- Block 14: Orange triangular prism (left side)
- Block 16: Orange triangular prism (right side)

Note: I don't see a perfect match for the red cube in the left structure.

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 4
    Step2: Move block with index 7
    Step3: Move block with index 5
    Step4: Move block with index 15
    Step5: Move block with index 10
    Step6: Move block with index 10
    Step7: Move block with index 15
    Step8: Move block with index 6
    Step9: Move block with index 6
    Step10: Move block with index 14
    Step11: Move block with index 16
}
```

This assembly order first completes the left structure (except for the red cube which doesn't have an exact match in the dictionary), then builds the right structure starting with the cylinders, adding the top triangular prism, the blue blocks, and finally the side triangular prisms.
